title: Los Angeles/Downtown
name: Kendall's Brasserie
hours: Lunch: M-F 11:30AM-2:30PM (''also Sa-Su 11:30AM-2:30PM on matin√©e performance days at the Music Center''); dinner: Tu-Su 5PM-close (''seating closes 1 hour after final performance'')
content: Great French menu at a perfect location to catch any of the great evening programs at the surrounding venues. Whatever you order, do not miss their French Fries!
